cause.description:
"The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain." -Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Kissing in the rain Singing in the rain Dancing in the rain Running in the rain Driving in the rain Swimming in the rain Walking in the rain
...we must embrace the fact that EVERYTHING is simply more majestic in the rain. Everything.
Rain has the extradordinary power to either make us forget our fears or hide our tears when we can't force our worries to the back of our mind. Rain makes us feel small (thunderstorms in particular.) It puts everything back into perspective. Rain is cleansing. Rain is beauty.
1. Dance in the rain
cause.name: Rain
